_meanings:
or {#virAwa#} <ab>N.</ab> of a country lying to the west of
Dholpur; the Pāṇḍavas are said to have entered it
from the banks of the Yamunā through the land
of the Rohitakas and Sūrasenas towards the north 

of Daśārṇa. Vairāṭa, the capital of Virāṭa, is
probably the same as Bairat 40 miles north of
Jeypore.
